result.reason: Feature request from core maintainer to skip serializing default/inherited connection properties, reducing XML file size and improving save performance
result.approach: In XmlConnectionNodeSerializer28, compare each property against DefaultConnectionInfo defaults and the inheritance flags — only emit XML attributes whose values differ from the default when inheritance is not enabled for that property. This preserves backward compatibility (reader already handles missing attributes as defaults) while significantly reducing file size for users with many connections using default settings.

attempts.raw_output:
